surveys.surveyTitle: What to do in the summer?
surveys.surveyDescription: This survey is collecting data on what people would like to do during summer.

questions.questionTitle: Which of the the following would you like to do most?
Write shortly about your favorite summer memory.

surveys.surveyDescription: We are studying which coding languages people like the most.

questions.questionTitle: Which was the first language you learned?
Which language or languages you are using at the moment?
